title: New: Broken Twin – Sun Has Gone
body:
Averting attention away from itself, yet subconsciously enticing the listener to experience something that is knowingly unobtainable to them, is a skill that **Broken Twin** has mastered and brings to her new recording, the sombrely titled _Sun Has Gone_.

  
_Sun Has Gone_ has an acute awareness of itself and of what it presents to the listener with its impeccable timing and conscious, melancholy focus; whilst still remaining restrained enough to present itself as modest. Broken Twin’s music – with its belated release of energy and tension – is used as a means only to tell us of her story, a story underlined with grief, but outlined with beauty; as her latest track evidences.
